item.title: [Project Insanity] Fixing Crowns in Clan Chat & PM
item.dc:creator: @Drzw Drzw
item.description:
@Drzw wrote:

This is an easy fix, I’ve seen many people complaining that when they talk in they’re clan chat they have a moderator crown instead of a yellow crown for a owner/administrator, same with the PM’ing so I am here to help!

Client-Sided

Open up Client.java

Search for

Right below that you will see something like,

case 1: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[1].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; case 2: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[2].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; case 3: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[2].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; case 4: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[0].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; default: j2 += clanNameWidth; break; }

So let’s say you want to change the Moderator crown to a Mod Crown instead of it being a Donator Crown when you talk.

What you simply would do is go to “case 2:” now remember the cases are the same like in the characters data file, playerRights = 1 (Moderator)
So then under “case 1:” you will change the “modIcons[0]” to “modIcons[1]” the 0’s and 1’s inside of here are just like going ingame and typing <img=1> and a crown popping up.

There we have it, you have fixed your problem!

Compile & enjoy!

Read full topic
item.source: [Project Insanity] Fixing Crowns in Clan Chat & PM
